So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that.//short desc should be less than256char Mark Normand has been told the same advice his whole life: DON'T BE YOURSELF, whatever you're thinking about saying, don't. So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that. He's not a bad guy, but in a PC world where no one will discuss anything uncomfortable, how is Mark going to understand things if people won't explain them? Just because something is inappropriate, doesn't mean it's wrong. Mark Normand, Amy Schumer, Mark Normand, Amy Schumer, Steven Ast, Jakob Markovits, Kim Caramele, Ryan Cunningham, Kevin Kane, Ayesha Rokadia
